VEvil.​GameLogic.​Cameras.​Gameplay.​GameCamera
VEvil.​ICE.​AICEVirtualCamera
public sealed
VEvil.​GameLogic.​Cameras.​Gameplay.​GameCamera

GameCamera is supposed to be the main camera-controller used in the "gameplay" phase of VE.  This camera is managed by the ICESystem and is heavily inspired from the camera used in League Of Legends.

You can use the ICESystem to get this instance from everywhere (if instantiated when asked).

Variables
newPosition
private Vector3 newPosition

Our next position to follow.

Used to lerp the current position with this one to smooth everything.

Properties
InputProvider
public GameplayInputProvider InputProvider {
get;
private 
set
}

The GameCamera's GameplayInputProvider.

Settings
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("The settings this GameCamera will use.")]
public GameCameraSettings Settings {
get;
set
}
Freeze
public bool Freeze {
get;
set
}

When true, the GameCamera won't move at all.

Use ListenInputs instead if you wish to simply cut the control of this GameCamera from the user.

ListenInputs
public bool ListenInputs {
get;
set
}

When false, the GameCamera won't listen any inputs from the user.

FollowTransform
public Transform FollowTransform {
get;
set
}

If you give a Transform value here, the GameCamera will follow this object.

Having something else than "null" will make ListenInputs having no effect.

HandleKeyboardMovement
private void HandleKeyboardMovement()

Handle the movement of the GameCamera with the keyboard using the InputProvider.

HandleScreenEdgeMovement
private void HandleScreenEdgeMovement()

Handle the movement of the GameCamera with the Screen's Borders.

ExecuteCameraSmoothing
private void ExecuteCameraSmoothing()

Execute the GameCamera's smoothing logic.

Nothing fancy, just lerp-ing the current position with the newPosition.
